description: From a Scandinavian source. Compare Middle Swedish vitterliga, early Danish viderlige.

adverbs.description: witterly (comparative more witterly, superlative most witterly)

entries.meaning: (obsolete) Clearly, certainly; without doubt; truly. [13th–16th c.]
examples: I […] asked hir on þe hieȝe name · ar heo þennes ȝeode / What she were witterli.
